description: This file defines a React component for an events page in a frontend application. It handles state management, fetching paginated event data from an API, and rendering the list of events with search and pagination controls.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches a list of events based on the current search query and page number, updating the component's data state.

methods.name: onSearch
methods.description: Handles search form submission, resets to page 1, and triggers data reload.
